K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334a-0: @334a / /rgya gar skad du; a'arya m'a yo pa ma sa m'a dhi n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334a-2: 'phags pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334a-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334b-0: bcom ldan 'das grong khyer w'a ra na s'i na drang srong lhung ba @334b ri dvags kyi nags na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334b-1: dgra bcom pa nyi khri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334b-2: byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong la 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i seng ge dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334b-5: legs par gnas pa'i blo gros dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334b-15: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334b-20: lha'i bu mtshams bzang dang legs par gnas pa'i blo gros la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa nyi khri dang yang thabs gcig go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334b-21: de nas bcom 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334b-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying po stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334b-23: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:334b-24: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335a-1: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335a-2: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335a-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335a-7: khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas dris pa lung bstan pa'i phyir /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335a-10: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335a-11: ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335a-12: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335a-13: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335a-15: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335a-16: mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335b-7: padma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod ni 'di ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335b-9: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335b-10: khyod 'di ltar sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335b-11: snying rje par zhugs pas padma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335b-12: padma'i dpal gyi snying po khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:335b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-3: chos gcig dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-4: mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-5: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob cing ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-6: sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-8: chos gcig po gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-10: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum pa thams cad la mi gnas pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-11: nang ngam phyi rol la gnas par mi byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-12: de gnas pa med pas yang dag pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-13: yang dag pa mthong bas yang dag pa la sbyor bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-14: yang dag pa la sbyor bas ci la'ang blo thogs par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-15: de blo thogs pa med pas yang dag pa'i bya ba la spyod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-16: yang dag pa'i bya ba la spyod pa de gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336a-18: chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-0: @336b chos gang yang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-1: chos thams cad ni rkyen las 'byung ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-2: rkyen med par 'byung ba'i chos ni gang yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-3: chos gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de ni ma skyes pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-4: de ltar na chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-5: chos thams cad ma skyes par rtogs par gyur pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa rtogs pa 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-6: 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-7: snying rje'i sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-8: de de ltar mos pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rab tu shes so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-9: chos thams cad ni yongs su brtags pas sprul pa ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-10: yongs su brtags pa de'ang shin tu stong pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-11: chos thams cad stong par rtogs pa de ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-12: ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus mngon par sprul nas sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de bzhin du chos ston pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-13: ci nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro; ;de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:336b-14: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa gang la la dag 'khor 'dir 'dus pa lta mchis sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337a-5: 'khor 'di na bsams bzhin du go cha bgos pa gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa skyes bu dam pa drug cu yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337a-7: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa drug cu po dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337a-10: skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337a-11: 'on te 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na'ang gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag kyang mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337a-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub kyi phyogs cha logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes @337b la chos kyang ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob ces bya ba dang gnyis ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337b-3: padma'i dpal gyi snying po skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzhan dag nub bdun du 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa de dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337b-4: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337b-5: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mang du mchis so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337b-8: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337b-10: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sgrim mi 'tshal bar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dri ba'i lan nyan pa'i slad du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337b-13: ji skad zer pa de de bzhin te; de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dag ni tshad med grangs med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:337b-14: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-1: ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji lta bu'i sems kyi mtshan ma bstan pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-4: skyes bu dam pa de gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-5: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas gda' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa legs par mdzad du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-7: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-9: skyes bu dam pa de gnyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mchis na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-11: rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-12: skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las chos 'dri ba'i lan thos pas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-13: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob par 'gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'ang mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-0: mthong nas kyang rigs kyi bu'am @338b rigs kyi bu mo dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-2: der skyes ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying pos gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-4: mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu bkye ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-5: 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-6: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri'i tshogs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-8: ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-12: khor yug chen po gang dag yod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-13: gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag de dag thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba des khyab par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-14: nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-16: 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag kyang mig gi dbang po la snang bar ma gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:338b-17: nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong las thal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339a-0: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de thams cad gser gyi kha dog gi snang ba chen pos @339a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339a-2: de nas 'od de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339a-3: lan bdun bskor ba byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339a-4: bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar mi snang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339a-5: de nas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339a-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339a-7: nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis bltas pa de'ang mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339a-9: skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu lag mthil du bzhag pa ltar mthong nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339a-11: mchog tu dga' ba rgya cher skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339a-12: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gang dag 'dus pa dge slong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339b-16: byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339b-19: ri'i rgyal po bzhin du 'bar ba de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339b-20: thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang sa ler mthong ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339b-23: skyes bu mig dang ldan pas 'dom gang tsam gyi phyogs na skyes bu gcig shos kyi bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sgrim mi dgos par mthong ba de bzhin du /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339b-25: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339b-26: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas gang ba yon tan gyi bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa de'ang snang ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339b-27: mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:339b-28: mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyes te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:340a-1: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad kyang brjod do //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:347b-8: yongs dag zhing de dag kyang mi mchog la lar ston pa mdzad //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:349b-7: 'di na rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun dang nyan thos rnams dang ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:349b-8: rkyen gyi rgyal ba 'dus pa rnams kyis 'tshal bar nus ma lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:349b-9: de ltar 'di dag la sogs mtha' yas thabs dang ldan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:349b-10: 'dul ba'i don du sku yi mdzad pa mtha' yas ston par mdzad //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:349b-15: bsod nams ci mchis ngas ni 'di na 'gro ba ma lus pa //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:350a-5: nyam nga ba nyung ngam bskyod pa yang ngam /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:350a-8: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:350b-0: de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus @350b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying pos /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:350b-7: gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa dag ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:350b-8: 'on te byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi mthu lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:350b-9: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:350b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356a-20: zhi ba bla na med par rab tu ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356a-21: sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-0: rab 'byams zhing rnams kun na @356b srogs chags kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-1: mkhyen nas gang gis mya ngan 'das mchog la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-2: reg par 'gyur ba de 'dra'i chos kyang ston //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-3: mi mchog khyod kyi thugs rje ci 'dra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-4: ji snyed rab 'byams zhing gi nyan thos dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-5: rkyen byung thub pa ma lus de dag la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-6: de 'dra ba yi snying rje yod ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-7: bsod nams phung po mtshan mchog rnams dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-8: rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-9: bye ba'i nyi las lhag pa'i gzi mnga' ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-10: mi mchog mtshungs ma mchis la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-11: chos sprin rgyal las chos char 'bebs pa na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-12: gang dag rgya chen mos pa spyod yul pa; ;sngon gyi sangs rgyas spyod la 'jigs ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-13: de dag rtag tu bde gshegs mdun na mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-14: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-15: mi mchog mthong ba rnyed par shin tu dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-16: bsod nams las kyis bsam pa yongs sbyangs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-17: de dag mig lam rnam par 'dren rnams gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-18: rgyal ba'i sku ni chos dbyings rgyas par 'gengs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-19: zhing rnams rab 'byams thams cad na yang gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-20: bzhud dang byon par mngon pa yong ma mchis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-21: 'on kyang 'jig rten dag na snod bzhin gda'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-22: bden pa gzigs shing don dam ston pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-23: chos kyi sbyin bdag gzhi ba'i thugs ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-24: brgal nas srog chags bcings gyur gzhan sgrol ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:356b-25: bde bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-1: kyis skye ba'i shing ljon rtsa nas bton //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-2: nga rgyal ri bo sra ba rdul du brlags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-3: god pa mi mnga' g-yo dang sgyu dang bral //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-4: rab zhi thugs dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-5: mi mchog chags pa thams cad yod mi mnga'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-6: dgongs pas dang chu dang me dang 'dra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-7: rgyal ba sems can kun la snyoms thugs ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-8: rlung dang nam mkha' 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-9: thub pa chen po yon tan 'di 'dra'i gter //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-10: bsod nams rgya mtsho las byung sku dang ldan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-11: bskal pa khrag khrig ngag tu de brjod kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-12: yon tan rgya mtsho zad par nus ma lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-13: yon tan rgya mtsho lha mis mchod pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-14: bdag ni bu dang bcas te mchod pa bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-15: rgyal ba mchod pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-16: des ni thub pa chen po khyod 'drar shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-18: de nas rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dus gzhan zhig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-19: skyed mos tshal na bsam gtan gyi gnas pas gnas shing 'dug pa'i glo g-yas g-yon nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-20: tsandan sbrul gyi snying po'i padma bkra ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-23: padma de gnyis las khye'u ming rin chen sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-24: rin chen mchog ces bya ba gnyis rdzus te byung nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357a-25: skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-0: de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid @357b de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas khye'u gnyis skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-1: mthong nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-2: khyed gnyis lha 'am klu yin nam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-3: gnod sbyin dri za mi 'am ci //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-4: mi 'am mi ma yin nam ci //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-5: dris pa smros shig grogs po dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-7: de ltar rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi g-yas phyogs su byung ba'i khye'u gang yin pa des rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-8: grogs po chos kun stong pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-9: ming ni 'dri bar byed dam ci //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-10: chos rnams thams cad ming med na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-11: gang gi ming ni 'dri bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-12: stong nyid gang la'ang lha med cing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-13: klu med srin po yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-14: mi'am mi ma yin yang rung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-15: thams cad de na yod med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-17: de nas khye'u gcig shos des rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-18: ming ni ming gis stong pa ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-19: ming la ming ni yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-20: chos rnams thams cad ming med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-21: 'on kyang ming gis yongs su brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-22: ming gi rang bzhin gang yin pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-23: de ni ma mthong ma thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-24: las kyis 'gags pa ma yin na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-26: tha snyad du ni ming byas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-27: ming btags byas te bstan pa ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-28: kho bo'i ming ni rin chen sems //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:357b-29: gcig shos rin chen mchog ces bya //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-1: po; de ltar khye'u gnyis kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras te mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrubs nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-2: rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid de dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-3: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-5: de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-6: padma dag dang dri bda' dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-7: me tog phreng dang na bza' dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-8: 'on te zas dang skom gyis sam //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-9: rgyal po ji ltar mchod par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-10: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-11: ji ltar mchod par 'gyur ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-12: don 'di legs par bstan du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-15: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des khye'u de gnyis la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-16: lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358a-17: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-0: mtshan mchog sum cu @358b gnyis ldan pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-1: sangs rgyas dag la mchod par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-2: mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-3: gangg'a'i bye ma'i grangs snyed dag /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-4: me tog rnams kyis bkang byas te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-5: 'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-6: gang gis 'dir ni thal sbyar nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-7: byang chub tu ni sems btud na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-8: 'di ni bsod nams ches mang ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-9: de la tshad ni yod ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-10: byang chub sems ni ci 'dra ba //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-11: de ltar blo mchog gis bstan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-12: de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-13: de 'dra ba yi dpal yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-15: de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis slar yang bcom ldan 'das de la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-16: 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-17: bdag cag yi dam yang dag 'cha'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-18: bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-19: lha dang mi dag gas na mdzod cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-20: ji srid du ni 'khor ba yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-21: sngon gyi mtha' ni mi dmigs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-22: de srid bskal pa du mar yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-23: sems can phyir ni spyad par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-24: ji tsam sngon gyi mtha' dran pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-25: rnam grangs 'di yi tshul dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-26: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-27: de srid bskal par spyad par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-28: gal te de ring slan chad du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-30: phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-31: sangs rgyas rnams ni bslus par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-32: de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:358b-33: phrag dog ser sna'ang de bzhin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-2: rdzun gyi tshig ni spang bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-3: gal te de ring slan chad du [?]//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-4: rdul med byang chub ma thob bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-5: bdag cag nyan thos sems gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-6: des ni brdzun du smra bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-7: nam yang rang sangs rgyas su ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-8: bdag cag dga' bar mi bgyid de //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-9: sems can rnams la snying rje zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-10: bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-11: ji ltar 'dren pa khyod kyi zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-12: grub pa rnam pa 'di dag las //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-13: gzhan du yon tan bye ba snyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-14: phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing du bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-15: de na nyan thos gang yang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-16: rang rgyal 'dren pa dag kyang med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-17: de tshe bye ba tshad med pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-18: byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gnas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-19: bde ba 'di dang ldan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-20: skye bo dri ma med par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-21: sangs rgyas mdzod ni bzung bas na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-22: sangs rgyas chos rnams tshar phyin to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-23: gal te 'di dag gzhan min par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-24: de bzhin du ni 'gyur nges na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-25: rgya mtshor bcas dang rir bcas pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-26: sa 'di thams cad g-yos par shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-27: tshig 'di smras pa'i mod la ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-28: sa yang rab tu g-yos par gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-29: sil snyan dag ni ma dkrol bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-30: de na thams cad sgra yang 'byin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-31: stong phrag bye ba'i lha rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-32: me tog char dang phye ma'i char //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-33: spos kyi char ni yid 'ong dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359a-34: na bza' bye ba rab tu phab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359b-1: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du dogs sam yid gnyis za na de ltar mi blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid ces bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359b-5: de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u rin chen sems dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359b-6: rin chen mchog ces bya ba de gnyis gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du 'dzin na de'ang de ltar mi blta'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khye'u rin chen mchog ces bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob 'di ni khye'u rin chen sems zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359b-10: rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa ni de yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359b-11: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359b-12: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359b-14: skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ji tsam du zab mo la mos pa gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:359b-15: gang gi ming yang ma dmigs pa de srid du 'di gnyis byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa ngo mtshar to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360a-1: bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na [?] sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la rim grol gyis par gyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360a-4: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma ni bgrang bas mtha' rtogs par nus kyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360a-5: skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i pha rol na sangs rgyas dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni de lta ma yin te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360a-6: de srid du 'di gnyis kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360a-7: skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos shing yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360a-8: 'di gnyis kyi yon tan dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' padma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360a-10: 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bgyi ba de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360a-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser 'od seng ge rnam par rol pa'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba gang logs [?] pa de 'di nas phyogs gang logs na mchis /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bsags pa dpag tu @360b med pa bde ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360b-1: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360b-2: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' padma'i dpal gyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360b-3: 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360b-4: skye bo phal po che dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360b-8: bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod ba ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360b-9: nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360b-13: skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mtshan ji skad ces bgyi ba de dag legs par bstan du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:360b-14: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366a-0: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bud med @366a *//

K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa ni mad pa gsung ba lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366b-6: gal te bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhing bud med gzhan gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas thos pa'i mod la bud med kyi dngos po las 'gyur ba lta na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366b-9: phung po 'di nyid la bud med kyi dbang po mi gda' bar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366b-10: skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur cig ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366b-11: de nas srid mo de de nyid du bud med kyi dbang po mi snang bar gyur te skyes pa'i dbang po byung bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366b-12: de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyon mongs pa thams cad zlog pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padma'i dpal gyi snying po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366b-17: byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366b-21: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:366b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:367a-1: bu'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:367a-2: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-055-004:367a-3: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
